Safe & Sharp Clipping Blade — Sharp stainless steel and ceramic blade,with round head design,you can do the grooming at home easily and safely.
Washable & USB Rechargeable — Large capacity lithium-ion battery,can be charged via USB cable anytime,you can trim you pet in the garden or any other outdoor occasions.The blade is detachable and washable directly under the water tab,you can clean the hair with the brush easily.
Long Time Power Supply — The pet clipper built-in powerful & rechargeable lithium-ion battery,it can work 90 minutes of cordless operating after 3 hours fully charged,it can keep home pet grooming running continuously,no more worries about power off when working.
Warm Tips for Pet Trimming — If your pets have thick and long coats, please do use the scissor to cut shorter firstly. Or else the clipper may get jammed up while trimming.

item.content:encoded:
Price: $14.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 09:32:36 UTC – Details)



[helping pets overcome fears] if your dog hates nail trimming or nail grinding, use this dog hammock for grooming. you can restrain him effortlessly, do his nail trimming, hair grooming, bathing and many more jobs easily with half the effort and twice the success!this dog grooming hammock can help dogs be at ease and calmly watch you work. you never need to fight with your pet for nail trimming again.
[simple and convenient to use] put the dog’s legs into the holes, clearly marked front and rear; then use the hooks to hang the hammock off the ground. if your dog feels nervous for the first time, try some snacks to soothe him. he will calm down quickly and have minimal difficulty.when your dog gets used to the hammock, she will even enjoy it.
[professional nail clippers and file]  our nail clippers are recommended by many professional pet groomers. this pair of nail clippers is professionally made with a safe guard blade, which can prevent you from the risk of over-cutting and causing damage to your pet’s nails. meanwhile, the kit is also equipped with a file, which can file the trimmed nails more round and smooth. most groomers and veterinary clinics like to use our tool set.
[suitable for various sizes dogs] the dog grooming sling hammock has four sizes for you to choose, large, medium，small and extra small. no matter what breed your dog is, you can find the corresponding size.  it’s suitable for any dog under 80 pounds. if you bought the wrong size or have any other issues, our 24 hour tailored service will work to make it right until you are satisfied.

【Super Quiet & Low Vibration】: Trimming pet nails is not an easy task, and many pets are afraid of the loud sound of the dog nail grinder, which not only irritates them, but also scares them. So this professional dog nail trimmers comes in handy, with a high quality motor, super quiet and low vibration, so pets are not afraid to grind their nails.
【2 Adjustable Speed & 3 Ports】: 2-speed of power, strong and weak adjustable enough to support heavy grinding. 3 types of nail grinding, suitable for large, medium and small dogs and cats, you can choose the nail trimmer port according to the different sizes of pets and the hardness of the nails.
【Upgraded LED Light Dog Nail Trimmer】: DEELOKI pet nail grinder has LED light , so you can clearly see your pet’s blood line and avoid over-grinding and hurting your pet. Compared with other dog nail trimmers, this light will be more accurately illuminated.
【Portable Cordless &USB Rechargeable】: Cordless pet nail trimmers, compact ergonomic design, easy to carry and use, no matter when and where you can grind your pet’s nails. Rechargeable 4 hours can last up to 8 hours of use.

From the brand

Depets, founded in 2016, is a professional pet supply brand. We specialize in pet daily necessities, toys, cleaning and grooming supplies.

Over the years, we have been dedicated to providing high-quality products and great services to pets and pet owners around the world. Our goal is to make a better life for pets with every pet owner.

Great Brush, Healthy Pets. The cat grooming brush with round beads can do massage for your pets and prevent scratching your pet’s skin. The design of stainless steel needles with a 60-degree bend and some elasticity is good for preventing skin disease and increasing blood circulation.
One-click Cleaning Button. You just have to Simply push the button and the hair will be super simple removed from the cat hair brush. Furthermore, our dog grooming brush is washable, which can be kept in clean.
Comfortable and Nonslip Handle. Our cat shedding brush is designed with a comfort-grip and nonslip handle, and this self cleaning cat brush also has a massage function for your hand and you won’t get tired easily when you brush your pet.
Enjoyable Brushing Experience. Grooming pets can strengthen communication and further the bond between you and your pets. Our pet brush is suitable for all breeds and coat types. With Depets dog and cat shedding brush, your beloved pet will enjoy the time of grooming.

From a variety kind of pet brushes, I chose this one for my own lovely pets (Yoyo & Yiyi). Every time I brush Yiyi, she rubs my hand and makes enjoyable meow. As for my doggy Yoyo, she always has a happy face when I do this to her. We all love this cat and dog shedding brush, so I want to share it with every pet owner and I hope you and your beloved pet will enjoy it like us.

Washable:Washable feature keep the brush hygienic

Size: 7.7″ ×4.1″(L×W)

Color: blue + white

Material: Stainless steel + ABS Plastic + Rubber

The round end of the needles can do massage for your pets without scratching his/her skins, which is good for preventing skin disease and increasing blood circulation.

The comfort-grip handle is designed to prevent hand and wrist strain.

Read more

Valuable Brush. This cat slicker brush can easily remove loose hair, shedding Mats, tangled hair, Dander and Dirt of your lovely pets, our cat brushes for indoor cats not only keep your pets clean, but also provide you with a hygienic home environment.

Healthy Pet. The dog shedding brush with round beads can increase blood circulation and keep your pet’s coat soft and shiny.

Read more

Usage

Step1: Brush your pet with gentle move.

Step2: Click the button.

Step3: Remove the hair from the pet brush.

Read more

How to reduce the pain during brushing?

  1. Hold the hair root with one hand, comb along the direction of hair growth with the other hand;
  2. When the hair knots are serious behind the ears and on the neck, the movements should be gentle;
  3. Comb the long hair layer by layer, turning the outer layer over and combing the inner layer.

What if my pet doesn’t like this dog and cat hair brush?

You can guide with snack, lengthen the grooming time every day, our self cleaning slicker brush is gentle and not stimulating, your cute pet will gradually like it.

Note:

  1. Store out of reach of children.
  2. Stress may cause skin irritation, you should brush your pet gently.
  3. Be careful with pets that suffer from skin irritation or weak skin sensitivity.

item.content:encoded:
Price: $66.98 - ($58.99 / Count)
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:17:22 UTC – Details)

From the brand

oneisall

Founded in 2012

oneisall focus on creating products that give our pets and pet owners a better experience.

“oneisall” started with dog clippers. Its original intention is to allow pet lovers to enjoy simple, convenient and cost-effective services in pet grooming.

Behind the “oneisall” brand is the story of pet lover Peter. He found that taking dog for grooming would cost hundreds of dollars every month, and dog’s feeling was not good. Every time the clipper’s noise scared Joe. So Peter set out to design a low-noise and easy-to-use clipper.

Most popular products

Why do we love what we do?

At oneisall, our passion is pets,which drives us to produce the best possible products for our furry friends.We are borned from love for furbabys.

What makes our products unique?

We focus on making products that give our pets and pet owners a better experience. Leave the customer feedbacks in our top priority and put them into the design of products.

What’s our vision

oneisall hopes that we can bring peace of mind and quality to every pet owner, so that every pet can grow strong and healthy, and pet owners ca obtain longer and happier companionship.

Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 7.8 x 4.92 x 1.85 inches; 7.83 Ounces
Item model number ‏ : ‎ C61
Batteries ‏ : ‎ 1 Lithium Polymer batteries required. (included)
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ oneisall
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B089W594LC

★ Quiet and Low Vibration Design: The dog clipper’s noise when working is about 60 db,ensure your pet is comfortable throughout the grooming process,without causing him any discomfort.
★Built-in Battery: Rechargeable by USB with indicator light, make it more convenient,without changing batteries. This nail trimmer can be used for about 2 hours after 2 hours of fully charging.
★Safe and Sharp Blade & Powerful Motor:Upgrade stainless steel fixed blade can provide excellent cutting performance. Works great for trimming small areas like paws,ears and eyes.
★What You Get: oneisall dog clipper set(with one small blade and one middle blade),one cleaning brush,one USB charging cord.

How to remove and install the blade?

1.Remove the blade counter clockwise rotation;

How to remove and install the blade?

2.Pull the blade out;

How to remove and install the blade?

3.Put the blade back to the clipper;

How to remove and install the blade?

4.Install the blade clockwise rotation.

Counter clockwise

Pull out

Put it back

Clockwise

4 Steps to Do Pet Hair Grooming

1. Bathing your dog,keep it clean with no dirt;

2. Grooming with a brush,remove the dirt and knots;

3.Shave dog hairs with oneisall dog clipper.

4.Use the dog trimmer to shave the small area hair.

function isValidUrl(url) {
if (!url) {
return false;
}
var encodedUrl = encodeURI(url);
return encodedUrl.match(
/^(https?:\/\/)?(([a-z0-9-]|%[A-F0-9]{2})+\.)+(([a-z]|%[A-F0-9]{2})([a-z0-9]|%[A-F0-9]{2})*)(:[0-9]+)?(\/[a-z0-9;:,~!+#@&=%\/$\.?_-]+)?$/
);
}

function isNumericPrice(price) {
if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.trim();
}
}

function resetModalToInitialState(currentMonth, currentDate, currentYear) {
var enableOnlineStoreRadio = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_onlineRadio’);
var enableOfflineStoreRadio = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_offlineRadio’);
var onlineStoreInputForm = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_onlineInput’);

var onlineYear = document.querySelector(‘#onlineYear’);
var onlineCalendar = document.querySelector(‘#onlineCalendar’);

var offlineState = document.querySelector(‘#offlineState’);
var offlinePriceRaw = document.querySelector(‘#offlinePriceRaw’);
var offlineDay = document.querySelector(‘#offlineDay’);
var offlineMonth = document.querySelector(‘#offlineMonth’);
var offlineYear = document.querySelector(‘#offlineYear’);
var offlineCalendar = document.querySelector(‘#offlineCalendar’);

var thankYouDiv = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_thank’);
var errorDiv = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_error’);
var submitButton = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_submit’);
var loadingGifDiv = document.querySelector(‘#loading’);

var stateDefaultOption = document.querySelector(‘#stateDefaultOption’);
var stateDefaultPrompt = document.querySelector(‘#stateDefaultPrompt’);

if (thankYouDiv) {
thankYouDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (errorDiv) {
errorDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (loadingGifDiv) {
loadingGifDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (submitButton) {
submitButton.style.display = ‘block’;
}
onlineUrl.value = ”;
onlinePriceRaw.value = ”;
onlineShippingRaw.value = ”;
offlineStoreName.value = ”;
offlineCity.value = ”;
offlineState.value = ”;
offlinePriceRaw.value = ”;

stateDefaultOption.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();
stateDefaultPrompt.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();

setInitialStates(
onlineMonth,
currentMonth,
offlineMonth,
onlineDay,
currentDate,
offlineDay,
onlineYear,
currentYear,
offlineYear,
onlineStoreInputForm,

From the brand

We understand pets are like family and have worked hard to developed products for both you and them to enjoy. Our collections have wide variety of designs and sizes in order to suit your pets needs and fit into any home style. We’ve curated thoughtful products that are both functional for your pet and timeless in design. You will be able find everything you need to help your furry friend feel right at home.

Shop Storage Bins

Shop Ceramic Food Bowls

Shop Food Mats

More to love from Bone Dry!

Polyester Polyamide Microfiber
PERFECT TOWEL TO DRY SMALL, MEDIUM, AND LARGE DOGS AND CATS: Bone Dry Pet Towel measures 41×23.5″ and is great for drying dogs and cats of different breeds and sizes
MATERIAL AND CARE: Towel is made of ultrasoft microfiber, machine washable, and super absorbent, making drying your pet easy; For best long lasting results, do not use fabric softener
LIGHTWEIGHT DURABLE AND EASY TO CARRY: This towel can be stored in your car for on the go trips for your pet or at home; Provides comfort for your pet and protection for your couch, carpet, car, bed, floor, or chair
KEEP YOU PET WARM AND COZY: Great for grooming, traveling, a pet kennel, or cage to keep your pet warm, cozy and comfortable
MORE BONE DRY PET PRODUCTS: Bone Dry is a highly trusted brand for pet accessories; Click Bone Dry above to view more of our products


Pet Towels

DII Bone Dry microfiber dog bath towels with embroidered paw print or bone are durable, absorbent, and fast drying. These microfiber dog bath towels are long lasting and machine washable. Quickly dry off your pet after bath time with DII super absorbent pet towels.

Lightweight and easy to care for, this towel can be stored in your car for on the go trips for your pet or at home.

Great for grooming, traveling, in a kennel, or cage to keep your pet warm, cozy and comfortable.

Visit Our Brand Page

To view more of DII’s pet products visit our official site for our entire selection.

  • Wicker Pet Baskets – Three Sizes!
  • Pet Storage Bin-Three Sizes in Various designs
  • Non-Skid Pet Food Bowl- Three Sizes with Various designs
  • Pet Bath Towels
  • Pet Blankets
  • Pet Bed-Machine Washable!
  • Cage Liner and Under Cage Mat

Read more

DII Bone Dry Pet Products





Wicker Pet Basket

DII wicker pet toys and accessories storage or home décor bone shape basket comes in three sizes: 18 inch long by 7.5 inch tall, 21 inch long by 78 inch tall, and 24 inch long by 9 inch tall These wonderful baskets easily clean with a damp wet cloth or sponge. DII wicker baskets are dark espresso in color with a modern look making this a great décor piece for your home. The lid securely latches to keep your pet from opening, so no more sneaking treats! The convenient handle makes it easy to transport or move when needed. DII wicker pet baskets are perfect for holding dog treats, leashes, toys, blankets and more!

Pet Bed

DII Bone Dry Ultra Plush Padded Pet Bed is perfect for your dog or cat. Elevated sides block drafts and also give your pets a place to rest their head on. Available in various sizes to fit a variety of breeds. Made of durable Oxford fabric and filled with premium polyester fiber for added support. Our Ultra Plush Padded Pet Bed is machine washable and cushion is removable making cleaning super easy. Give your pet the perfect place to cuddle while adding stylish décor to your home with DII Bone Dry Ultra Plush Padded Pet Bed.

Ultra-Absorbent Microfiber Pet Mat

Bone Dry Microfiber Pet Mat provides your pet with their own dining area to minimize mess. It absorbs spills and keeps their eating area nice and dry. This pet placemat is made of super absorbent microfiber and immediately absorbs any slop, splash or spill. A great piece for your pet’s kennel or cage – maximum absorbency ensures that your pet is not lying in spilled water while you are away. Protect your carpets and hardwoods from water spills or food stains with DII’s absorbent pet mat.

Cuddly Pet Blankets

DII Bone Dry absorbent microfiber pet blankets come in an assortment of colors and excellent for travel or nap time for your adorable pet. DII offers wonderfully made absorbent microfiber pet blankets that features a cute and adorable bone shape design and are heavenly soft to touch. These pet blankets are perfect for your pet to lie on while in a car, crate, and kennel to keep your pet warm, cozy, and dry.

Read more





Microfiber Plush Mop Mitt Towel

The best towel for drying your pet. Each side is sew together allowing for pockets for your hands. These pockets give you the ability to quickly run the towel up and down your pet and dry quickly. Microfiber Chenille will quickly grab dirt and water off of your pet, 10 times more absorbent than cotton. Because of this, your towel is picking up more moisture on your pet. Your pets will dry faster, making bath time a lot easier.

Non-Skid Ceramic Pet Bowl

DII Bone Dry Non-Skid Ceramic Pet Bowl is perfect for your dog or cat – suitable for food and water and available in various designs and sizes. The bowl is conveniently dishwasher safe so it can be easily cleaned. The silicone rim at the bottom will keep your pet’s bowl from sliding around on the floor, which means no more messy floors for you to clean. Delight your hungry pup with this ceramic bowl in a fun print with a stay-put silicone bottom.

Pet Storage Bin

DII pet toys and accessories rectangle storage basket comes in three sizes. The neutral colors and subtle texture of these baskets makes them great décor pieces for your home. The storage basket stands upright and the convenient handles make it easy to transport or move when needed. DII pet toys and accessories round storage baskets are perfect for holding dry dog treats, leashes, collars, toys, blankets, outfits, grooming supplies, and more!

Bone Dry Pet Toy

Bone Dry loves pets! Our Pet Toy collections are great way to bond with your furry pal. Buy one or a pair today to make tails wag and dog owners smile. Our squeaky dog toys provide comfort and satisfies your dog’s natural urge to chew. With so many characters to choose from in different toy styles our DII Bone Dry toys are great for hours of fun. Perfect for your pooch to entertain themselves or a bonding experience with you and your pet.

【Dog Clippers & Nail Grinder Used Alone & with Vacuum】Our pet clippers, paw trimmer and dog nail grinder can be used alone, don’t need to connect hose, you can trim your dog anywhere as these clippers are cordless. You also can use clipper with vacuum. Gives you the freedom to groom your pet anywhere in your home or even outside
【Low Noise Design】Our pet grooming vacuum’s noise only 60 dB. 3 adjustable suction levels to choose ,making your pet dogs feel relaxed and not be scared during grooming.
【Easy Empty Dustbin & Easy to Store】With a detachable 1.4L dust box, 25% more capacity than others,easy-to-empty, do not need to empty often during grooming. The removable dust cup is equipped with an easy empty lid for quick, mess-free empty after cleaning.The device is highlighted with space-saving feature, we provide storage boards and bags for easy storage.
【7 in 1 Pro Pet Grooming Kit】oneisall pet grooming kit with vacuum make home grooming easy.It includes 7 proven grooming tools.The grooming brush and the deshedding tool gently remove loose hair and making pet hair shiny and smooth while eliminating tangles. Electric clipper, dog paw trimmer and dog nail grinder provides excellent cutting. Give your pet a best grooming experience. Nozzle head and Cleaning brush can be used for collecting pet hair falling on the carpet, sofa and floor.

The DEELOKI Pet Nail Grinder gives high ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $19.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:59:31 UTC – Details)

From the brand

DEELOKI aims to “Healthy, Safety and comfortable ” life for pets. We all know that trimming pet nails is not an easy work, this unique pet nail grinder is specially made for pets with whisper quiet, fast and painless trimming.

The DEELOKI Pet Nail Grinder gives high performance grinding through any pets size.Lightweight with ultralight vibration it has amazing noise absorption.Your pet will love this amazingly simple solution to claw maintenance.

Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 6.07 x 3.07 x 2.22 inches; 12.45 Ounces
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ September 7, 2022
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ DEELOKI
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B0BDDZXMPS

【Super Quiet & Low Vibration】: Trimming pet nails is not an easy task, and many pets are afraid of the loud sound of the dog nail grinder, which not only irritates them, but also scares them. So this professional dog nail trimmers comes in handy, with a high quality motor, super quiet and low vibration, so pets are not afraid to grind their nails.
【2 Adjustable Speed & 3 Ports】: 2-speed of power, strong and weak adjustable enough to support heavy grinding. 3 types of nail grinding, suitable for large, medium and small dogs and cats, you can choose the nail trimmer port according to the different sizes of pets and the hardness of the nails.
【Upgraded LED Light Dog Nail Trimmer】: DEELOKI pet nail grinder has LED light , so you can clearly see your pet’s blood line and avoid over-grinding and hurting your pet. Compared with other dog nail trimmers, this light will be more accurately illuminated.
【Portable Cordless &USB Rechargeable】: Cordless pet nail trimmers, compact ergonomic design, easy to carry and use, no matter when and where you can grind your pet’s nails. Rechargeable 4 hours can last up to 8 hours of use.

4.5
